title: WOULD IT COST MORE OR LESS TO USE SOME OR ONE OF THE BOARDED HOUSES ON CLAY STREET TO BE USED AS POLICE SUB-STATION?
text:
This
isn't an option that has been explored as far as we are aware.
Regarding cost, this would be something that the police department
would need to look into. But there are no plans to use it at this
time, so no numbers would be available.
